20101213180609.143|20101213180610.571|CCO|IT CERTAINLY FELT THAT WAY FOR 
20101213180610.571|20101213180612.000|CCO|MONTHS.
20101213180612.000|20101213180614.500|CCO|TO FIGURE OUT ANOTHER WAY, A 
20101213180614.500|20101213180617.000|CCO|DIFFERENT WAY TO PAY FOR THIS 
20101213180617.000|20101213180619.500|CCO|BESIDES THIS TAX, THAT'S GOING 
20101213180619.500|20101213180622.000|CCO|TO BE INCREDIBLY HARD.
20101213180622.000|20101213180623.429|CCO|>> LET'S GO TO NANCY DEPAUL AT 
20101213180623.429|20101213180624.857|CCO|THE WHITE HOUSE HANDLING HEALTH 
20101213180624.857|20101213180626.286|CCO|CARE.
20101213180626.286|20101213180627.714|CCO|LET'S TALK TO HER.
20101213180627.714|20101213180629.143|CCO|NANCY, THANK YOU FOR JOINING US 
20101213180629.143|20101213180630.571|CCO|SO QUICKLY.

20101213180638.000|20101213180640.000|CCO|2012 EVERYBODY -- MOST PEOPLE, 
20101213180640.000|20101213180642.000|CCO|WOULD HAVE TO BE INSURED IN SOME
20101213180642.000|20101213180643.429|CCO|FASHION AND THAT WAS GOING TO 
20101213180643.429|20101213180644.857|CCO|PAY FOR EVERYBODY ELSE WHO HAD 
20101213180644.857|20101213180646.286|CCO|PRE-EXISTING CONDITIONS OR

20101213180649.143|20101213180650.571|CCO|THIS RIGHT NOW?

20101213180652.000|20101213180653.429|CCO|WATCHING US WHO THOUGHT, WOW, IN

20101213180654.857|20101213180656.286|CCO|FOR ME?
20101213180656.286|20101213180657.714|CCO|>> Reporter: FIRST, LET ME PUT 
20101213180657.714|20101213180659.143|CCO|IT IN CONTEXT.
20101213180659.143|20101213180700.571|CCO|TODAY'S RULING IS ONE OF -- 
20101213180700.571|20101213180702.000|CCO|THERE'S ABOUT 20 COURT CASES IN 
20101213180702.000|20101213180703.429|CCO|THE FEDERAL DISTRICT COURTS 
20101213180703.429|20101213180704.857|CCO|AROUND THE COUNTRY CHALLENGING 
20101213180704.857|20101213180706.286|CCO|THE CONSTITUTIONALITY OF THE 
20101213180706.286|20101213180707.714|CCO|LAW.
20101213180707.714|20101213180709.143|CCO|THIS SOMEONE OF THOSE 20.
20101213180709.143|20101213180710.571|CCO|AND WE'VE ALREADY PREVAILED ON 
20101213180710.571|20101213180712.000|CCO|TWO OTHERS.

20101213180713.429|20101213180714.857|CCO|FEDERAL DISTRICT COURTS HAVE 
20101213180714.857|20101213180716.286|CCO|HELD THAT THIS PROVISION IS 
20101213180716.286|20101213180717.714|CCO|CONSTITUTIONAL.
20101213180717.714|20101213180719.143|CCO|IT'S IMPORTANT TO KEEP THAT IN 
20101213180719.143|20101213180720.571|CCO|MIND.
20101213180720.571|20101213180722.000|CCO|SECONDLY, THE WAY YOU'VE BEEN 
20101213180722.000|20101213180723.667|CCO|TALKING ABOUT AS I'VE HEARD IS 
20101213180723.667|20101213180725.333|CCO|THE TAX THAT WILL RAISE MONEY TO
20101213180725.333|20101213180727.000|CCO|PAY FOR THE HEALTH REFORM.
20101213180727.000|20101213180728.667|CCO|THAT ISN'T EXACTLY RIGHT.
20101213180728.667|20101213180730.333|CCO|THE PROVISION JUST SAYS THAT IF 
20101213180730.333|20101213180732.000|CCO|PEOPLE CAN AFFORD IT, THEN THEY 
20101213180732.000|20101213180733.250|CCO|NEED TO HAVE HEALTH INSURANCE.
20101213180733.250|20101213180734.500|CCO|AND IF THEY NEED HELP WITH THAT,
20101213180734.500|20101213180735.750|CCO|THEY'LL GET TAX CREDITS OR 
20101213180735.750|20101213180737.000|CCO|SUBSIDIES TO HELP THEM AFFORD 
20101213180737.000|20101213180738.250|CCO|IT.
20101213180738.250|20101213180739.500|CCO|SO WHY IS THAT IN THERE?
20101213180739.500|20101213180740.750|CCO|WELL, THAT'S IN THERE BECAUSE WE
20101213180740.750|20101213180742.000|CCO|NEED TO BE ABLE TO BAN THIS

20101213180750.333|20101213180752.000|CCO|OVER THE COUNTRY.
20101213180752.000|20101213180753.250|CCO|AND YOU CAN'T BAN PRE-EXISTING 
20101213180753.250|20101213180754.500|CCO|CONDITIONS UNLESS YOU -- 
20101213180754.500|20101213180755.750|CCO|PRE-EXISTING CONDITIONS 
20101213180755.750|20101213180757.000|CCO|EXCLUSIONS UNLESS YOU GET 
20101213180757.000|20101213180758.250|CCO|EVERYBODY INTO THE SYSTEM.

20101213180803.429|20101213180804.857|CCO|>> THAT'S AN INTERESTING

20101213181224.000|20101213181226.000|CCO|ING US.

20101213181233.111|20101213181234.222|CCO|LOOK AT IT, IT'S NOT ABOUT

20101213181235.333|20101213181236.444|CCO|GETTING EVERYBODY INTO THE 
20101213181236.444|20101213181237.556|CCO|SYSTEM.
20101213181237.556|20101213181238.667|CCO|>> EVERYONE AGREES THAT THIS 
20101213181238.667|20101213181239.778|CCO|COUNTRY NEEDS TO TAKE CARE OF 
20101213181239.778|20101213181240.889|CCO|PEOPLE WITH PRE-EXISTING 
20101213181240.889|20101213181242.000|CCO|CONDITIONS.

20101213181243.250|20101213181244.500|CCO|FOR ANYONE THAT IF YOU'VE HAD 
20101213181244.500|20101213181245.750|CCO|BREAST CANCER NO ONE WILL INSURE
20101213181245.750|20101213181247.000|CCO|YOU.

20101213181248.250|20101213181249.500|CCO|SO YOU WANT TO GET THOSE PEOPLE
